name: Tony Tony Chopper
text:
Blocker (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)
On Play: If your board has DON!! less than or equal to your opponent, add up to 1 DON!! from your DON!! deck rested.

effect.text: After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.
If your board has DON!! less than or equal to your opponent, add up to 1 DON!! from your DON!! deck rested.
conditions: your board has DON!! less than or equal to your opponent
